Name: Raybound
About the game: Everyone is born with an appearance of some sort, but you simply don't seem to know what you are... Raybound is a short adventure where you are a textureless square that must go on a quest to find yourself... - Cast your rays on objects to navigate the world, with these strange, synthetic flowers... - Go through five chapters that test your skill in puzzle solving and platforming. Are these, stars? - Experience bizarre scenarios that may lead you into a reality beyond ours... - And you get to look at this pricket having a good sleep...
Meta Title: Raybound: May 28, 2021, Braveo and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Raybound? Check out the release date (May 28, 2021), developer insights from Braveo, and a complete game summary.
